foods.description: HERSHEY'S, MILK CHOCOLATE BAR WITH ALMONDS
foods.lowercaseDescription: hershey's, milk chocolate bar with almonds
foods.ingredients: MILK CHOCOLATE (SUGAR; MILK; CHOCOLATE; COCOA BUTTER; LACTOSE; MILK FAT; SOY LECITHIN; PGPR, EMULSIFIER; VANILLIN, ARTIFICIAL FLAVOR); CHOPPED ALMONDS (ROASTED IN COCOA BUTTER AND/OR SUNFLOWER OIL).
